You are bidding on a new ParanormalSystems.com MiniBox - the first publicly
available version of the famed 'Frank's Ghost Box'. 

Full product description is available at http://paranormalsystems.com
<http://paranormalsystems.com/> 

Frank Sumption, the designer of the Ghost Box, sometimes known as 'Frank's
Box', has done much pioneering work in the use of applying technology to
capturing EVP messages. His method, which has been published in many places
across the web, consists of using an AM radio circuit with an automated
scanning system, which continually tunes the radio back and forth. Frank's
theory is that the sound energy is captured and used by spirits to form
words and phrases. The results have been astounding in some cases, but it
takes time and patience to learn to use his device skillfully.

Frank Sumption does not sell his boxes to anyone. When he is moved to do so,
he will construct a box and give it to a person, but he will not build them
for public sale. I believe this device should be made available to anyone
who desires one. This could be the next step in spirit communication, but
without many persons using these devices, keeping notes and recordings, we
will never know.

  _____  

Read what Frank Sumption has posted regarding the MiniBox...

 I listened to the 25 second sound clip, and it sounds comparable to mine,
not as much noise though. It is tuning across radio, and is using radio
stations as the raw audio source. The first word is 'sphinx' from the clip.
I have had that image on my shower window all week(Sphinx or Hotep)! The
next phrase is 'Doris doesn't like your boobs' (really, I don't have em') .
I'd say the thing works, and it sounds good. If I had the money I would buy
one. As far as for what I heard, it's been my expereince that it changes for
the listener, so no doubt someone else will hear something entirely
different. The point is, meaningful messages are formed out the raw audio,
as this technology is intended to function. I would expect it to do like my
version, work different for every user.

Frank Sumption in ITC-EVP group - 11/16/2007 




  _____  

 We arranged for Frank to have a private session with the MiniBox at the
Stanley Hotel - here's what he had to say...

 With The Mini Box available, I feel less compelled to try to put mine into
production, so don't have to feel forced to spend every waking minute
building stuff.   I don't care who makes the things, it's great to have the
technology available to anyone that can afford it. The stress has been
lifted--THANK YOU Ron Ricketts!



I have only two boxes at the moment, one is not meant for travel, as I have
it set up with a seperate power supply, and sound chamber for testing...
There is the box made by paranormalsystems.com, it works, and there is a
sound sample on the site. I saw the Mini Box at the Stanley and was
impressed.

  _____  

Rosemary Ellen Guiley also had several sessions with the MiniBox. Here's
what she said about it...

I was at The Stanley Hotel in Colorado last weekend, and was excited to get
to work with the new Mini-Box built by Ron Ricketts. I was also happy to
meet Frank for the first time!

I had several sessions with the Mini-Box with April and Allen Slaughter of
the Association for the Study of Unexplained Phenomena, and found it quite
impressive. Very compact, long battery life (and rechargeable) and good
clarity. "Seven" came through for me in every session. We had a session with
Mark Macy, and a short one with Frank -- wish it could have been longer. I'm
getting one of the first of these boxes, and it will be a valuable addition
to the two Frank's Boxes that I'm working with. 

  _____  

One of the most incredible tools for capturing EVPs is the 'Ghost Box',
sometimes known as 'Frank's Box'. This device uses actual off-the-air
information to generate and capture meaningful messages.

I was intrigued with the concept so after several months of study and
research I developed a device which functions in the same manner as these
other Ghost Boxes but uses special components and a simplified tuning method
that can be mastered by anyone. This unit is auto-tuning so no special
warm-up or calibration is required. Only three simple controls to use. In
addition to output for a loudspeaker, it can also use headphones for private
listening. Also, a tape recorder jack is provided so you can record
directly, without using microphones. To simplify recording of sessions with
the box, an external microphone input is included. When recording, one
channel is exclusively for the questioner, the other is for the MiniBox
output.

The MiniBox is small, battery-operated, and uses a powerful industrial
quality sealed GelCel. It will operate 50 or more hours between charges.
Compact, it can be carried in the hands while being used.

While this device uses the principles of the "Ghost Box", its design is
unique and unlike any other similar devices that have been created. It is
designed to be simple to use, robust in the field, reliable and very
sensitive.

  _____  

Features... 

  _____  

Wider Tuning Range - tunes over and under AM band 

Output to external speaker or headphones 

Line Output for recorder or computer sound card 

Mic input to allow questions to be recorded on independent audio channel 

Simple to use - only three controls 

Completely Portable - battery operated, over 50 hours per charge 

 

  _____  

You will receive... 

  _____  

The MiniBox, charged and ready to go 

Battery Charger 

Adaptor Cable for use with tape or digital recorder 

Speaker Cable for Use with External Speaker 

External Antenna for Use in Fringe Reception Areas 

Full Instruction and Usage Manual 

Deluxe Clamshell Heavy Duty Storage and Carry Case 

  _____  

The winner of this auction will receive this new MiniBox immediately on
receipt of payment. This item will be shipped by insured Priority Mail to
all US addresses.

This is not a toy, novelty, or electronic Ouija board. It is a serious tool
for the paranormal investigator.

For more information on the MiniBox, go to  <http://paranormalsystems.com/>
